department: Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
description: Please ensure that if the notice falls within the bounds of the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), give the expansive description from the text, otherwise:This is a New Notice for Temporary Help Services. Please Download and Read carefully the Request For Proposal(RFP) document(s) for this Contract., based in the Subject description
full_summary:
### Invitation to Tender for Temporary Help Services

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFAITD) is soliciting proposals for the provision of Temporary Help Services (THS) professionals with expertise in records management. This is a competitive tender, open to registered temporary help services (THS) supply arrangement holders who have qualified for services in the National Capital Region.

**Reference Number**: 23-225010
**Publication Date**: November 23, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: December 8, 2022
**Estimated Delivery Date**: 48 weeks after contract award

**Offer Requirements**: We are seeking experienced professionals with intermediate-level expertise in records management. The selected service provider will be responsible for providing up to 4 resources, dependent on the volume of client requests and ongoing projects. Activities will include:

* Access management and security
* IT Service Management (ITSM)
* Technical support and assistance
* Liaison with other teams to update/improve tools, processes, and procedures

**Contract Details**: The proposed contract period will commence upon award and will extend for a duration of 48 weeks. The estimated value of the contract is not specified.

**Key Requirements:**

* Expertise in records management at an intermediate level
* Possession of relevant certifications and experience in access management and security
* Proven track record of delivering high-quality services in a National Capital Region context
* Ability to work collaboratively with other teams and stakeholders

**Submission Requirements**: Proposals can be submitted in either official language. Please ensure that your proposal includes the following:

* A detailed outline of the services to be provided
* A description of the qualifications and experience of the proposed resources
* A breakdown of the estimated costs and fees

**Questions and Inquiries**: Questions and inquiries regarding this RFP must be submitted to the Contracting Authority, Cadmiel Martel, at cadmiel.martel@international.gc.ca. Request for Proposal documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the qualified supply arrangement holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement.

**Note**: The Duty Point for this procurement is 200, Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, QC.

### Important Documents

Please click on the following links to access the complete tender package:

* English package: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/23/a6729400537966f3be456db936fe85f4
